message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I really like the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you like the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125. What do you think?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $125 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $120, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'll give you one last chance to meet my minimum price. I'll sell it to you for $119
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $119 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
